Interrogator: So what was the girl worry about being late to?
Interrogee: While she was in a hurry, because she didn't want to miss the early class in the morning.

Interrogator: Okay,so what task was given to her?
Interrogee: Also she was given some amount of money for some task

Interrogator: Okay, so what was the reaction to the task which was assigned to her?
Interrogee: She said that she will be late for her class. And she immediately went to the, to her school.

Interrogator: Was it something special in the class that day that she was so worried?
Interrogee: No, there was nothing special in that class?

Interrogator: Who elevated her with a task?
Interrogee: I do not remember. So there was this man who handed her a packet

Interrogator: What was she doing while going to school and did the girl meet while going to school and what she was supposed to to do
Interrogee: She met one guy. And who handed her a packet. And the packet had cash. And after that, she went straight to school.

Interrogator: Who come to the class after the exam was over? And what they intended to do.
Interrogee: some two to three professors all wearing burqas. And women, they were women. They came to the class for a random BAG check.

Interrogator: What did they find during the back check?
Interrogee: So they found like a mobile phone in one of the girls that's it they did not find anything else in anyone's bag

Interrogator: Why was one of the girl asked to leave the class?
Interrogee: Because she had a mobile phone, which they call it and they asked her to leave the class as mobile phone was strictly not allowed to be taken into the school.

Interrogator: What was the girl worried about and what action did she take?
Interrogee: The girl was worried that they will find the thing that was in her bag, which is a lot of money. So she put it under her foot
Yes, they did not find anything in her. And they did not check under her foot so she was able to rescue herself in that situation.

Interrogator: And what did she do immediately after the inspector leave from the class?
Interrogee: There was no inspector. After the professor left. She she did not do anything. I don't know. I don't think she did anything. I did not see her anywhere else.

Interrogator: Was the girl caught and what happened after. So the teacher went away the
Interrogee: girl was not caught and nothing happened after that
